languages.text: "Судя по тому, что Калькасар ни разу не вмешался в жизнь станции, ему плевать на Футфол. А значит, и на то, кто им заправляет, пока на станции тихо. Я сделаю так, чтобы было тихо. Да, он отрядил Чорде охрану, но если она уже..." {n}Токара делает ударение на последнем слове.{/n} "...будет мертва, и от смерти ее не будет пахнуть смертоносной ересью, он, вероятно, не станет отвлекаться на разбирательство. Лорд-инквизитор просто доверит управление тому, кто не будет создавать ему проблем. Мне".

traits.locale_text: "Судя по тому, что Калькасар ни разу не вмешался в жизнь станции, ему плевать на Футфол. А значит, и на то, кто им заправляет, пока на станции тихо. Я сделаю так, чтобы было тихо. Да, он отрядил Чорде охрану, но если она уже..." {n}Токара делает ударение на последнем слове.{/n} "...будет мертва, и от смерти ее не будет пахнуть смертоносной ересью, он, вероятноя, не станет отвлекаться на разбирательство. Лорд-инквизитор просто доверит управление тому, кто не будет создавать ему проблем. Мне".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."
languages.original_text: "Судя по тому, что Калькасар ни разу не вмешался в жизнь станции, ему плевать на Футфол. А значит, и на то, кто им заправляет, пока на станции тихо. Я сделаю так, чтобы было тихо. Да, он отрядил Чорде охрану, но если она уже..." {n}Токара делает ударение на последнем слове.{/n} "...будет мертва, и от смерти ее не будет пахнуть смертоносной ересью, он, вероятно, не станет отвлекаться на разбирательство. Лорд-инквизитор просто доверит управление тому, кто не будет создавать ему проблем. Мне".

traits.locale_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he doesn't care about Footfall. Which means he also doesn't care who runs the station so long as things are quiet on it. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already—" {n}Tocara emphasises the last word. "—dead and her death doesn't smell of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Me."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “考虑到卡尔卡扎从来没有干涉过落脚港的事务，事实很明显，他根本不在乎这座星站。也就是说，他不在乎是谁在管理这个地方，只要这里一切正常就行。我会确保一切正常。没错，他确实要求库尔达维持这里的秩序，可如果她已经——”{n}弗拉迪姆特别强调了这几个字。{/n}“——已经死了，而且她的死不会牵扯到重大异端事态，大审判官可能根本不会去费心调查这件事情，只会把管理权交给某个不会给他惹麻烦的人，比如像我这样的人。”
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到卡尔卡扎从来没有干涉过落脚港的事务，他应该是根本不在乎这座星站。也就是说，他不在乎是谁在管理这个地方，只要这里一切正常就行。我会确保一切如常。没错，他确实要求库尔达维持这里的秩序，可如果她已经——”{n}弗拉迪姆特别强调了这几个字。{/n}“——已经死了，而且她的死与重大异端事态无关的话，审判长可能根本不会去费心调查这件事情，只会把管理权交给某个不会给他惹麻烦的人，而这个人就是我。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「カルカサルがステーションの事件に関わったことがない事を考えると、彼にとってフットフォールはどうでもいいのだろう。つまり、局内が静かであれば、誰がステーションを運営しても構わないということだ。ここが静かである限りは、気を付けるつもりだ。チョーダには警備をつけたが、もし彼女がすでに…」{n}トカラは最後の言葉を強調した。{/n} 「…死んでいるなら。そして、致命的な異端の臭いがしないなら、わざわざ調査しないだろう。ロード・インクィジターは、問題を起こさない人物に統治を任せるだけだろう。つまり、私のような人物だ」
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: 「カルカサルがステーションの事件に関わったことがない事を考えると、彼にとってフットフォールはどうでもいいのかもしれない。つまり、局内が静かであれば、誰がステーションを運営しても構わないということだ。静かであるように、気を付けるつもりだ。チョーダには警備をつけたが、もし彼女がすでに…」{n}トカラは最後の言葉を強調した。{/n} 「…死んでいるなら。そして、致命的な異端の臭いがしないなら、わざわざ調査しないだろう。ロード・インクィジターは、問題を起こさない人物に統治を任せるだけだろう。つまり、私にだ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Teniendo en cuenta que Calcazar no ha interferido ni una sola vez en los asuntos de la estación, está claro que no le importa en absoluto. Esto significa que tampoco le importa quién dirige la estación, siempre y cuando haya tranquilidad. Yo me aseguraré de ello. Es verdad que le dio a Chorda un equipo de seguridad, pero si ya está...». {n}Tocara enfatiza en la última palabra.{/n} «... muerta y su muerte no parece herejía, es probable que no se moleste en investigar. Lo que hará el Lord Inquisidor es confiarle el gobierno a alguien que no le cause problemas, como yo».
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: «Teniendo en cuenta que Calcazar no ha interferido ni una sola vez en los asuntos de la estación, está claro que no le importa Paso. Esto significa que tampoco le importa quién dirige la estación, siempre y cuando haya tranquilidad. Yo me aseguraré de ello. Es verdad que le dio a Chorda un equipo de seguridad, pero si ya está...». {n}Tocara enfatiza en la última palabra.{/n} «... muerta y su muerte no parece herejía, es probable que no se moleste en investigar. El Lord Inquisidor lo que hará es confiarle el gobierno a alguien que no le cause problemas. A mí».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Wenn man bedenkt, dass Calcazar sich kein einziges Mal in die Angelegenheiten der Station eingemischt hat, ist klar: Footfall kümmert ihn einen Dreck. Also kümmert ihn auch nicht, wer die Station leitet, Hauptsache, es ist alles ruhig. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass alles ruhig ist. Gut, er hat Chorda Leibwächter zur Verfügung gestellt, aber wenn sie schon" {n}Tocara betont das Wort,{/n} "tot ist und ihr Tod nicht nach tödlicher Ketzerei stinkt, dann wird er sich nicht die Mühe machen, groß zu ermitteln. Der Großinquisitor wird die Leitung einfach jemandem übertragen, der ihm keine Probleme bereiten wird. Jemandem wie mir."
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man bedenkt, dass Calcazar sich kein einziges Mal in die Angelegenheiten der Station eingemischt hat, ist klar: Footfall kümmert ihn einen Dreck. Also kümmert ihn auch nicht, wer die Station leitet, Hauptsache, es ist alles ruhig. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass alles ruhig ist. Gut, er hat Chorda Leibwächter zur Verfügung gestellt, aber wenn sie schon tot ist und ihr Tod nicht nach tödlicher Ketzerei stinkt, dann wird er sich nicht die Mühe machen, groß zu ermitteln. Der Großinquisitor wird die Leitung einfach jemandem übertragen, der ihm keine Probleme bereiten wird. Mir."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Calcazar n'a jamais interféré avec les affaires de Castel, ce qui signifie qu'il se moque éperdument de la station. Tant que tout est calme, peu importe qui la dirige ; je vais donc veiller à ce que tout reste calme. Certes, il a attribué une équipe de sécurité à Chorda, mais si elle est déjà... {n}dit Tocara en insistant sur le dernier mot,{/n} morte, et si son trépas n'a pas des relents d'hérésie, il ne se donnera pas la peine de mener l'enquête. Il se contentera de confier le gouvernement de la station à quelqu'un qui ne lui causera aucun problème : quelqu'un comme moi. »
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: « Calcazar n'a jamais interféré avec les affaires de Castel, ce qui signifie qu'il se moque totalement de la station. Tant que tout est calme, peu importe qui la dirige ; je vais donc veiller à ce que tout reste calme. Certes, il a attribué une équipe de sécurité à Chorda, mais si elle est déjà... morte, {n}dit-il en insistant sur ce mot,{/n} et si son trépas n'a pas des relents d'hérésie, il ne se donnera pas la peine de mener l'enquête. Il se contentera de confier le gouvernement de la station à quelqu'un qui ne lui causera aucun problème : moi. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Calcazar'ın istasyon işlerine hiç karışmadığını düşünürsek Binliman'ı zerre umursamadığı da açıkça görülüyor. Yani gürültü patırtı olmadığı sürece istasyonu kimin yönettiği de hiç umurunda değil. O gürültü patırtıları önlemekse bana düşüyor. Gerçi Chorda'nın koruma birimini o ayarlamıştı ama..." {n}Tocara, son dediğini vurguluyor.{/n} "...Chorda öldüğüne ve bu ölümün kâfirlikle görünür bir bağı olmadığına göre soruşturacağını da sanmam. Lord Engizisyoncu, ayak bağı olmayacak birine teslim edecektir makamı. Benim gibi birine yani."
languages.original_text: "Considering Calcazar has never once interfered in the station's affairs, he clearly couldn't care less about Footfall. This means he also doesn't care who runs the station, so long as things are quiet here. I'm going to make sure things are quiet. Granted, he did give Chorda a security detail, but if she's already..." {n}Tocara emphasises the last word.{/n} "...dead, and her death doesn't reek of deadly heresy, he likely won't bother to investigate. The Lord Inquisitor will simply entrust governance to someone who won't cause him problems. Someone like me."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar'ın istasyon işlerine hiç karışmadığını düşünürsek Binliman'ı zerre umursamadığı da açıkça görülüyor. Yani gürültü patırtı olmadığı sürece istasyonu kimin yönettiği de hiç umurunda değil. O gürültü patırtıları önlemekse bana düşüyor. Gerçi Chorda'nın koruma birimini o ayarlamıştı ama..." {n}Tocara son sözcüğünü vurguluyor.{/n} "...Chorda öldüğüne ve bu ölümün kâfirlikle görünür bir bağı olmadığına göre soruşturacağını da sanmam. Lord Engizisyoncu, ayak bağı olmayacak birine teslim edecektir makamı. Benim gibi birine yani."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
